categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Melkans was a male Chiss who served as a commander of the Sith Empire's forces during the Korriban Incursion, when the Galactic Republic invaded the planet Korriban in 3637 BBY. during the Galactic War. Melkans was one four commanders who led Imperial forces in the Valley of the Dark Lords, but was slain by Republic forces in their advance to the Sith Academy.

Commander Melkans appears as one of the four Imperial commanders that must be killed in the Republic version of the Tactical Flashpoint "Assault on Tython," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.7: Invasion. For Imperial players, Melkans is replaced by Commander Alavai, and the two share many of their game mechanics.
